de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jhistory.rest

Class HistoryRestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jhistory.rest.HistoryRestService

  • @Path(value="history/v2/")
public class HistoryRestService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the REST interface of the JEngine history.

      • getActivityLog

        @GET
 @Path(value="scenario/{scenarioID}/instance/{instanceID}/activities")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getActivityLog(@DefaultValue(value="0") @PathParam(value="scenarioID")
                                                                                                                                                                 int scenarioID,
                                                                                                                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="0") @PathParam(value="instanceID")
                                                                                                                                                                 int instanceID,
                                                                                                                                                                 @DefaultValue(value=" ") @QueryParam(value="state")
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String state)
        This method gives the log entries for all activities for a specific scenario instance.
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - The id of the scenario belonging to the instance.
        instanceID - The id of the scenario instance.
        state - The current state of the instance.
        Returns:
        a JSON-Object with the log entries.
